inactive-form: This form is inactive and doesn't accept answers.
generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
honeypot-error: The honeypot field was filled and the answer wasn't sent.
captcha-error: The captcha wasn't filled out correctly. Please try again.
ratelimit-error: You've submitted the form too often. Please wait a moment and try again.
subscription-failed-invalid-email: The email address for the subscription is invalid.
form-draft: This form is a draft and can't be submitted or linked to in fields.
form-listed: This form is published and can be submitted.
duplicate-key: This form can't be saved: The key "{{ key }}" is already used in this form.
reserved-key: This form can't be saved: The key "{{ key }}" is a reserved keyword.
store-submissions-help: Save the answers as a Kirby page. Certain fields and actions may not be available if this option is disabled. For more information, see the (link: https://plugins.andkindness.com/dreamform/docs/general/data-retention text: documentation).
label: Label
error-message-help: The error message is shown when the field is **not** or in the **wrong format**.
number-step-help: The entered value must be divisible by this number. For decimals, use a number like "0.1".
options-label-help: The label is shown to the user.
options-value-help: The value is saved in the submission.
use-children-help: If activated, the listed child pages will be used as available options instead.
max-filesize-ini: The maximum file size of the PHP configuration is {{ size }}.
subject: Subject
new-form-submission-for: You have received a new form submission for your form "{{ form }}".
mailchimp-field-mapping-help: Map the form fields to the Mailchimp fields.
double-opt-in-help: Required for a GDPR compliant subscription.
ready-to-activate: Ready to accept form submissions on your site?
submissions-demo-mode: Submissions are only accepted from logged in users while in demo mode.
license-notice-local: You're activating DreamForm on your local domain {{ domain }}. If this site will be deployed to a public domain, please activate it there instead.
license-notice-default: Your license will be activated for the domain {{ domain }}.
license-key-help: You can find your license key after purchasing in the account area of the Love & Kindness plugin website.
invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
invalid-license: Please enter a valid license key.
license-demo-error: This site is in demo mode. Submissions are only accepted from logged in users.
confirm-as-spam: Are you sure you want to report this answer as spam?
confirm-as-ham: Are you sure you want to report this answer as not spam?
confirm-as-ham-unprocessed: Are you sure you want to report this answer as not spam? The submission workflow will be run for the first time.
error-while-processing: An error occured while processing the submission.
marked-as-ham: The submission was marked as ham.
marked-as-spam: The submission was marked as spam.
submission-log-type-invalid: The submission log type "{{ type }}" is not valid.
confirm-run-actions: Are you sure you want to run the current submission workflow for this form on this submission again?
actions-ran-successfully: The submission workflow was successfully run.
continue-submission-on-error-help: If this option is enabled, the submission will be stored and a success message will be shown even if an error occurs.
